title: There's Only One Ewe.
description: ***** Readers' FavoriteÂ® 5 Stars! *****It's a tough world out there. In order to face it (and thrive within it), kids need to know how their unique, one-of-a-kind, utter singularity can help them reach great heights. With rollicking rhymes and simple yet striking art, "There's Only One Ewe" takes kids (and kids at heart) on an exuberant journey of motivation and empowerment.
author: Pete Longname
